categories: Category:Sergeants and lieutenants of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Treshoda was a Human female who served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. She was tasked by Imperial High Command with studying the Balmorran resistance, and dealt with defectors such as Gryffin Remus.
Lieutenant Treshoda appears in the mission "The Defector" for players on the Imperial version of Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
